EmailTemplate.name: Final follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Sorry we haven’t heard from you. We wanted you to know that we are here and ready to assist you with your request; please feel free to reach out at any time in the future if there’s anything we can do to help. You can reach us by replying to this email or giving us a call at (512)402-5895.
Thank you again for your interest in YETI!
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
